loans.name: Andre

texts.en:
Andrea has been  an Esperanza Internacional borrower for 10 years.  She came to us because she  needed capital for her business. She started her business after she was working in a beauty salon, and she decided to have her own. Andrea is a single mother with 3 children. Andrea  took out her first loan to expanded her business because it was pretty small, and the clients were uncomfortable.

Andrea wishes to have a successful business. She enjoys her business. In her beauty salon she also sells, cosmetics, hair and beauty products and  sometimes she also sells clothing or shoes. This loan will be used especially to buy  beauty and hair products, because her clients also buy their hair products from her. Andrea thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy beauty and hair products

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte vendiendo materiales de construcción. El siempre ha sido un padre responsable que se preocupa por su familia el arduo trabajo que realiza le ha brindado alimento, vestimenta y educación a su hijo. El solicita este crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, bloques, zinc, clavos entre otros las mejoras que quiere realizar en su vivienda son de acondicionar un cuarto, pues desde hace tiempo quería hacerlo y porque no tenía el capital suficiente para realizar las mejoras.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel dedicates himself to providing transportation services selling construction supplies.  He has always been a responsible father who cares for his family.  The hard work he carries out has provided food, clothing and an education for his son.

He requests this loan to buy cement, sand, cinder blocks, zinc, nails and other supplies.  Among the improvements he would like to make to his house is  the completion of a room. This is something he has wanted to do for some time, but has not had enough capital.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, cinder blocks, zinc, and nails, among other items.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La señora Maria Teresa se dedica a sus 42 años de edad a la venta de diferentes productos comestibles tales como frutas, gaseosas y snacks en un pequeño lugar construido con madera y localizado a la orilla de la carretera principal del municipio de Puerto Berrio localizado al norte de Antioquia en el cual puede ofrecer sus productos a los viajeros. Esta labor la realiza la señora Maria Teresa desde hace 23 años, trabajando sola en una jornada desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m. Muy agradecida con su negocio el cual le ha brindado los ingresos necesarios para sacar adelante a sus cuatro hijos, la señora Maria Teresa desea surtirlo y así tener productos para ofrecerles a los viajeros y tener la esperanza de mejorar sus ventas y así la calidad de vida de sus hijos y padres.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa, at 42 years of age, dedicates herself to selling different edible products such as fruits, sodas and snacks from a small site built out of wood.  Her stall is situated on the side of the primary road of the Puerto Berrio municipality, in the north of Antioquia, where she can offer her products to travelers.  Maria Teresa has been carrying out this work for 23 years, working alone in her journey from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm.

She is very grateful for her business, which has provided the necessary income to help her four children get ahead.  Maria Teresa would like to supply her stall to have products to offer to travelers, and to have the hope to improve sales, thereby improving the lives of her children and parents.

loans.use: buy a supply of fruits, sodas and snacks.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer De Huatajata Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVO AMANECER DE HUATAJATA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Copacabana, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la señora Remedios es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de pescado, venta de verduras, venta de ganado, venta de charque, venta de papa.

La señora Remedios, indica que es el primer ciclo que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pescado que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su familia.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra de red para la caza de peces que adquirirá de La Paz y posteriormente lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia ya que ella es casada y tienen cuatro hijos.
texts.en:
The “NEW DAWN OF HUATAJATA” cooperative will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer.  As part of the focal center of Copacabana, it is comprised of ten members, and led by a management board of which Remedios is president.  The businesses that the members of the cooperative carry out are varied, but among them we have:  fish sales, vegetable sales, livestock sales, charque (dried llama meat) sales, potato sales.

Remedios indicates that this is the first time they are working with Pro Mujer, and that she joined the institution through the invitation of a promoter.  Currently, she has a business selling fish that she has had for years, having learned the trade from her family.

The loan that she will now take out is for the purchase of a net for catching the fish she will acquire from La Paz, and then sell in the markets.  This form of work permits her to generate the income to support her family, as she is married and they have four children.

loans.use: buy a net.

loans.name: Noelia

texts.en:
Noelia is one of Esperanza Internacional's entrepreuners. She came to us because she need to reinvest in her business. This is her first loan and she is very excited to be part of Esperanza. In her community there are some groups with loans and all the members are very happy and increasing their business.

Noelia sells clothing and jewelry. Her clients request the items or order them. She will use this loan to reinvest by purchasing jeans, blouses, shirts, etc, and silver and gold jewelry like rings, bracelets, necklaces and chains.

Noelia said her most important challenge is to buy  a vehicle because she wants to travel to different places and carry her merchandise. She enjoys her business. Noelia will use her business profits to reinvest and save. She is dreaming of having her family and her own house. Noelia thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: To buy clothes and jewelry.

loans.name: Jeremiah

texts.en:
Jeremiah is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is a mechanic, a business he has run for the last twenty three years. This is a field he pursued after his studies. He is also married and has five children.
Jeremiah is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy spare tires for his business. His main challenges are finding customers and some clients not paying on time.

loans.use: To buy spare tires for his business

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia de 72 años de edad es una mujer casada que tuvo 7 hijos y que ahora se encuentran en las edades de 36 a 54 años. Ella vive en la ciudad de Cartagena donde tiene una tienda llamada la económica, que hace honor a su nombre por los precios de venta que estima para sus productos, sin ella perder dinero. Su clientela está ubicada en su barrio y son familias que viven también en los aledaños a su negocio, donde ofrece ranchos, víveres y bebidas, al detalle.  Antonia conoce muy bien el negocio, pues sabe que cuando compra en mayor volumen, obtiene más ganancias que cuando lo hace poco a poco. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, con el cual comprará ranchos, víveres y licores, en  mayor volumen para ganar descuentos que trasladará a sus clientes, para tenerlos contentos y  que le sigan comprando, mientras  ella respondiéndole y gana dinero, lo cual le proporciona a ella y a su familia cada vez mas bienestar.  Ella obtuvo su experiencia comercial de manera independiente,  cuando emprendió una cafetería en la que le fue muy bien, la amplió diversificando, hasta convertirla en la tienda actual. En la actualidad ha recibido 6 financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual tiene 12 años de estar vinculada, desde cuando ingresó en un grupo solidario y esta es la organización  con la cual quiere seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Antonia, 72 years of age, is a married woman who had 7 children that are now ages 36 to 54.  She lives in the city of Cartagena, where she has a store called “The Thrifty One”.  Its name honors the low prices at which she offers her products, while still making a profit for herself.

Her customers live in her neighborhood and areas near her business, where she offers food, supplies and beverages at retail.  Antonia knows her business very well since she knows that, when she buys in bulk volumes, she makes a better profit than when buying supplies little by little.  This is the reason she turns to Kiva credit, as it will allow her to buy products in larger quantities and therefore at discounts that she can then pass along to her customers.  She wants them to be happy and to continue to buy from her.  In the meantime, she earns money that helps her provide for her family.

She obtained her experience in commerce independently, after starting a cafeteria that did really well.  She continued diversifying, and it became the current store.  To date, she has received 6 loans from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization she has been part of for 12 years.  She started when she enrolled in an independent group, and this is the organization with which she wants to continue to grow.

loans.use: buy food, supplies and beverages.

loans.name: Electina

texts.en:
Electina is a second hand clothes dealer. She lives in Likoni, Kenya. This is a business she began five years ago from her personal savings. After being introduced to Milango by her friends, Electina is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to purchase a new stock of clothes.
Her future ambition is to be a supplier of clothes to the area where she lives. The main challenge is the seasonal sales. The area depends on tourists and in the off season there are few sales.
Electina will use the income obtained from the loan to purchase other items like handbags and shoes.

loans.use: To purchase a new stock of clothes

loans.name: Drusilla

texts.en:
Drusilla is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. She has one child and operates a bureau stall which has been in operation for the past six years. Besides this, Drusilla also sells bed sheets, shirts and shoes. 

Drusilla is applying for a loan of KES 80,000 to purchase printing papers, a photocopier and soft drinks. She looks forward to investing the extra income into purchasing property for the family.

loans.use: to purchase printing papers, a photocopier and soft drinks.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith lives in Changamwe, Kenya. She has three children, all of whom are in school. She owns a second hand clothes boutique that has been in operation for the past four years. Judith also runs a 'second hand household items' store. She joined Kiva partnet, Milango, to access credit. Judith is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase a stock of school bags, bed sheets and bed covers. 

The main business challenge is price fluctuation, but Judith looks forward to open a larger store in future. She will use the extra income obtained from the business to pay school fees and to provide health care to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of school bags, bed sheets and bed covers.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es: La señora Adriana se dedica desde hace más de 12 años a prestar servicios de belleza tales como corte de cabello, tintura, cepillado y masajes en un local cerca de su vivienda y en el cual trabaja con dos personas más todos los días desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, esta es la única fuente de ingresos de la señora Adriana y con la cual puede generar los ingresos para su sostenimiento y el de su hijo de 12 años. Debido a dificultades de orden público, la señora Adriana tuvo que trasladar su negocio de un barrio a otro y así tener que comenzar desde cero para lo cual necesita de la compra de varios implementos de trabajo como planchas y secadores de cabello y tinturas. El sueño de la señora Adriana es posicionar de nuevo su salón de belleza y brindarle bienestar a su hijo y esposo.
texts.en:
For over 12 years, Ms. Adriana has been providing beauty services like haircuts, coloring, hairstyling, and massages at a location near her home. She works with two other people, every day from 10:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. This is Adriana's only source of income and the way she supports herself and her 12 year-old son.

Due to security problems, Adriana had to move her business from one neighborhood to another and start again from zero. Therefore, she needs to purchase various tools like hair irons, hair dryers, and hair dye. Adriana's dream is to reposition her beauty salon and to provide for her son and  husband's well-being.

loans.use: to buy equipment and cosmetics for her beauty salon

loans.name: Flor De Haba Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE HABA” iniciará su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Patacamaya, está compuesta por doce integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la señora Esperanza es la tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, tienda de barrio, constructor, taxista, venta de pan, venta de artículos varios, venta de tostado.

La señora Esperanza  indica que es el quinto ciclo que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida que viene trabajando hace años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de su hermana.

El préstamo que sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de víveres) que adquirirá de El Alto y posteriormente lo venderá en su comunidad. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en salud.
texts.en:
The “Flor de Haba” communal bank will start its fifth cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Patacamaya regional office. There are 12 members and the group is led by a board of directors, of which Señora Esperanza is the treasurer. The members of the communal bank are involved in a variety of businesses, including selling food, a neighborhood store, construction, driving a taxi, selling bread, selling sundry items and selling toasted sandwiches.

Señora Esperanza indicates that this is her fifth cycle with Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution because she was invited by a promoter. Currently she has a business selling food which she has been doing for years, having learned from her sister.

The loan that she will take is to increase her capital for the purchase of grocereies which she will adquire in El Alto and later sell in her community. Working in this way allows her to generate resources to support her family. She lives with a partner, and they have a child.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Esperanza responded that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to purchase groceries.

loans.name: Charles Murabu

texts.en:
Charles is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He sells fruits, a business he began using the savings he made from employment at a hotel. 
He is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase fruits and groceries to sell. 
The main challenge he faces is the seasonal weather. He intends to open a restaurant and a fast food business in the future. He will use the extra income from the business to develop his plot.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and groceries to sell.

loans.name: Enma Patricia

texts.es:
Enma es una mujer luchadora, trabajadora y responsable por sus hijos, es viuda, vive con sus hijos en San Gabriel Provincia del Carchi, en el Norte de Ecuador.

Enma trabaja sola en la crianza de cerdos, en el negocio le va bien es por eso que quiere ampliar su negocio con más número de cerdos pero para eso tuvo la necesidad de realizar un crédito a Fodemi para invertir en la compra de cemento, ripio, madera, tablas para la construcción de un nuevo corral para que alcancen más animales y que sus ingresos mejoren al igual que su calidad de vida gracias a su inversión.

Su sueño es poder tener un criadero de cerdos y poder distribuir a empresas grandes.
texts.en:
Enma is a determined, hard-working woman who is responsible for her children. She is a widow and lives with her children in San Gabriel, Carchi Province, in northern Ecuador.

Enma works alone raising pigs. Her business is going well, and for this reason she wants to expand it, with a larger number of pigs. For this, however, she needed to request a loan from Fodemi to invest in buying cement, gravel, wood, and boards to construct a new pen so she will have space for more animals. Thanks to this investment, her income will increase, along with her quality of life. 

Her dream is to have a farm where she raises pigs and distributes them to large companies.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, boards, wood, etc. to build a larger pen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water pump

loans.name: Aura Cecilia

texts.es: La señora Aura Cecilia trabaja como empleada doméstica realizando aseo y limpieza a casas de familia, debido a que en esta actividad recibe pocos ingresos, se vio en la necesidad de generar una nueva fuente de ingresos que le permita tener los recursos suficientes para su sostenimiento y el de su familia; es así como la señora Aura Cecilia desea comprar un carro para preparar comidas rápidas los fines de semana como hamburguesas y perros calientes. El sueño de la señora Aura Cecilia es mejorar su calidad de vida y poder suplir sus necesidades básicas.
texts.en: Aura Cecilia works as a housekeeper cleaning family homes.  Because this job doesn't earn her much money, she needed to come up with a new source of income so she would have enough income to support her family.  This is why Aura Cecilia wants to buy a car; to prepare fast foods, such as hamburgers and hot dogs, on the weekends.  Aura Cecilia's dream is to improve her quality of life and be able to meet her basic needs.

loans.use: to buy a car to prepare fast foods and to buy ingredients

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORI ORCCO”; La  socia vive en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Elisa; ella tiene 35 años de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos de 17, 8, 4, ella vive en el distrito de Urcos,  la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa,  de forma independiente, la socia viaja a la ciudad de Cusco para comprar ropa y trae para verder a sus diferentes amistades y clientes; la socia desea invertir en la mercaderia para incrementar sus ventas.


La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Qori Orcco Communal Bank.  She lives in the district of Urcos in the Quispicanchis Province of the department of Cusco.  

Her name is Elisa; she is 35 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children who are 17, 8, and 4.  She lives in the district of Urcos.  She buys and sells clothing on her own for a living.  She travels to the city of Cusco to buy clothing and brings is back to sell to her different friends and clients.  She wants to invest in merchandise to increase her sales.
	
She values and is more than thankful for the loan she has been granted because it allows her to grow her business and improve her quality of life.  She promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to increase her sales.

loans.name: Irma Amada

texts.es:
La señora Irma esta solicitando un crédito con nosotros ya que a su casa le hace falta la barda de material, ya que ahorita cuentan con una cerca de madera; por lo cual esta solicitando este crédito para comprar el material.
      La señora irma trabaja en un en un centro comercial y su esposo es velador, ellos tienen 3 hijos por los cuales se esfuerzan por hacer bien su trabajo para poder brindarles lo mejor posible. Estan solicitando el credito para la construccion de una barda por temas de seguridad ya que como tiene hijos pequeños y no se siente comoda al dejarlos solos en casta al irse a trabajar.
texts.en:
Irma is asking for a loan from us because her house needs a solid wall, as they currently have a wooden fence.  As such, she is asking for this loan to buy materials.

Irma works in a mall and her husband is security guard.  They have three children for whom they work hard at their jobs to be able to give them the best they can.  She is asking for this loan to build a wall for security reasons since she doesn't feel comfortable leaving her small children home alone when she goes to work.

loans.use: to build a wall around her house

loans.name: Elizabeth Sarahi

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 38 años de edad, vive en Villanueva Cortes, con su hijo de 14 años de edad, quien actualmente estudia, ella es madre soltera y para obtener ingresos se a dedicado a la venta de ropa para damas, zapatos, lociones  y cosméticos. Tiene dos años de hacer esta actividad. Comenzó vendiendo solo ropa, poco a poco los clientes le han pedido zapatos, lociones, cosméticos y otros. Ha solicitado este préstamo para surtir de más productos y cumplir con los pedidos que le han hecho de ropa, zapatos y cosméticos. Su meta es aumentar sus ventas y atender bien a sus clientes.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 38, lives in Villanueva, Cortes, with her 14-year-old son who currently is attending school.  She’s a single mother who in order to earn income sells women’s clothes, shoes, lotions and cosmetics.  She’s been in this line of work for two years.  She started out selling only clothes but her customers gradually requested shoes, lotions, cosmetics and others from her.  She has requested this loan to stock up on merchandise and to fill pending orders for clothes, shoes and cosmetics.  Her goal is to increase sales and provide good customer service.

loans.use: Surtir su negocio de ropa, zapatos y cosmeticos para la venta.

loans.name: Cristo Vive 1, 2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Janes is the coordinator of her group, Cristo vive 1, 2, 3 & 4 (Christ live), a group made up of mostly Haitian citizens. They are located in the city of La Romana, where, decades ago, Haitians emigrated to work in the sugarcane industry. They all live in a rural community outside of the main city. These kind of communities are called Batey, which are villages founded for sugarcane workers. Janes and her long-term partner make their home here in a simple structure (home made for the sugarcane worker). 

Janes is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has been running her business for almost six years. She started investing in selling gasoline in the main avenue from her community. While she was growing her business, she decided to add different products. Now she is selling chickens, like a small butcher, during the day while also selling the gasoline. She will invest this loan in buying chickens (by quintal, 100 pounds) and 10 gallons of gasoline. 

Janes wants to reinvest her business´s profits. For her future, she is dreaming to have her own house. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy chicken and gasoline.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORI ORCCO”; La  socia vive en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Rita; ella tiene 37 años de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, de 7, 4 y 7 meses de edad; ella vive en el distrito de Urcos,  la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia compra cuyes , gallinas, ovejas, la socia tiene animales menores y también tiene su tienda de abarrotes, la socia desea invertir el credito en la compra de productos de abarrotes como arroz, azucar, fideos, harina, entre otros. 


La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Qori Orcco Communal Bank.  She lives in the district of Urcos in the Quispicanchis Province of the department of Cusco.

Her name is Rita, she is 37 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children who are seven years old, four years old, and seven months old.  She lives in the district of Urcos.  She works in retail for a living, buying guinea pigs, chickens, and sheep.  She has small animals as well as a grocery store.  She wants to use her loan to buy grocery products such as rice, sugar, noodles, and flour, among other things.

She values and is more than thankful for the loan she has been granted because it allows her to grow her business and improve her quality of life.  She promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy grocery products, such as rice, sugar, noodles, and flour, among other things

loans.name: Luz Idalia

texts.es:
Doña Luz Idalia tiene 36 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijas y se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, la produccion es en dos jornadas una por la mañana y la otra por las tardes, sus clientes le visitan todos los dias (lunes a domingo), el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la produccion de tortillas, en estos momentos los pedidos de sus clientes han aumentado y no logra cumplir con todas las exigencias de los clientes, necesita el capital para poder producir mas.

la meta de Luz Idalia es que sus hijas se graduen del colegio.
texts.en:
Luz Idalia is 36 years old and lives with her three daughters.  She makes and sells tortillas for a living.  She makes them in two shifts, one in the morning and one in the afternoon.  Her customers come to her every day (from Monday until Sunday).  She will use her loan to buy supplies to make tortillas.  At the moment, her clients' orders have increased and she hasn't been able to meet all of their demands because she needs more capital to be able to produce more.

Luz Idalia's goal is for her daughters to graduate from school.

loans.use: to buy firewood, lime, corn, and water

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORI ORCCO”; La  socia vive en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Esther; la socia aún se dedica a la elaboración de panes y a la exportación de maíz, la socia y ademas de eso la socia ya cuenta con un local en el poblado de Huaro y pondra una quinta, la soica esta embarazada de su segundo bebe y esta muy feliz porque también hara realidad uno de sus sueños tener su quinta restaurante, la socia ya tiene casi todo listo para la quinta ecepto que le faltan algunos detalles y cubiertos por lo que desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de utensilios para el local, algunas sillas y mesas mas y en insumos para el mismo.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Qori Orcco Communal Bank. The member lives in the Urcos district, Quispicanchis province, Cusco department. Esther is the member. She still makes bread and exports corn for a living, and apart from that, she owns a store in the village of Huaro and plans to set up a restaurant. 

She is pregnant with her second baby and very happy because her dream of owning a restaurant will come true. She is almost ready to open her restaurant, except for some details such as cutlery, that's why she wishes to invest this loan in the purchase of kitchen utensils for the store, some chairs and tables, and other supplies for her business.

The member is infinitely grateful for and values the loan. This allows her to grow in her business and improve her quality of life. She pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy cutlery, chairs, tables and supplies for her new restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries, dairy products, staple grains, canned goods, and meat

loans.name: Belen De Jesus

texts.es: La señora Belén se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de prendas de vestir y productos de belleza por catalogo, esta actividad le brinda los recursos necesarios para el sustento de su hogar y en especial para el bienestar de sus dos hijos. La mercancía es vendida a familiares, amigos y vecinos. Aunque la señora Belén presenta dificultades de salud en su columna es una gran trabajadora y desea comprar surtido nuevo para ofrecer a sus clientes en la temporada de fin de año. El sueño de la señora Belén es tener su propio almacén y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Belen has been selling clothing and mail-order beauty products for ten years.  This business provides her with the income to support her household and especially to ensure the well-being of her two children.  She sells her merchandise to family members, friends, and neighbors.  Although Belen has back problems, she is a very hard worker and she wants to buy new stock to offer her customers for the holiday season.  Belen's dream is to have her own warehouse and to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to stock up on women's clothing

loans.name: Lia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORI ORCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lia; ella tiene 45 años de edad, la socia es soltera y la socia alterna la agricultura con la ganadería y especificamente con la compra y venta de productos lacteos, derivados y la venta de leche, la socia vende en la misma plaza principal del poblado a sus clientes y personas que desean llevar la leche a otros poblados cercanos. La socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y alegre, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el credito en la compra de leche, queso, requeson, mantequilla para la venta y de este modo incrementar sus ventas.

La socia se compromete a cumplir ocn el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido y de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Lia is a member of the community bank "Qori Orcco", located in the Urcos district in the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.

Lia is 45 years old, single, and works in agriculture and livestock, specifically the purchase and sales of dairy products and milk.  She sells in the main square of the town to her customers and people who want to bring the milk to other nearby towns.  Lia is a hardworking and happy woman.  She wants to use this loan to purchase milk, cheese, requeson, and butter to sell so that she can increase her sales.

She promises to make all of her payments on time and in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase milk, cheese, requeson, and butter.

loans.name: Delcy Yamileth

texts.es:
Delcy Yamileth, tiene 27 años de edad, vive en Colonia la López, Choloma junto con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, de 13, 10, 7 y 3 años de edad, tres de ellos estudian.
Delcy, muy emprendedora, se dedica a vender mercadería desde hace 5 años, ella vende artículos para el hogar, plásticos, juegos de ollas, cremas, ropa, zapatos y todo lo que le pidan sus clientes. Con este préstamo ella va comprar mercadería que le han pedido sus clientes y surtir el negocio, como ropa, zapatos, artículos del hogar y cosméticos. Su sueño es tener un negocio estable y educar a sus hijos
texts.en:
Delcy Yamileth, 27, lives in Colonia la López, Choloma, with her husband and four children who are 13, 10, 7 and 3 years of age; three of them attend school.

Delcy is very enterprising.  She’s been selling merchandise for five years.  She sells assorted items for the home, plastics, cookware sets, creams, clothing, shoes; whatever her customers ask for.

She will use this loan to buy merchandise her customers have ordered and stock her business with such items as clothes, shoes, items for the home and cosmetics.  Her dream is to have a stable business and to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Aminda

texts.es:
La señora Aminda tiene 50 años de edad, vive con su hijo menor, su casa esta ubicada en la comunidad de el Caimito, en su casa tiene una pulperia en donde vende lo necesario para consumo diario, ha luchado por salir adelante. 
Tiene muchos años de realizar esta actividad y a pezar de las adversidades de la vida a podido salir adelante su vida a cambiado ultimamente, tiene dos hijos en los estados unidos, los cuales le envian remesas que le ayudan a cubrir algunas necesidades.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra abarroteria, granos basicos, lacteos, embutidos y carne de res, cerdo y pollos.
su meta a corto plazo es tener mejor su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Amida is 50 years old and lives with her minor son. Her house is located in the community of Caimito. She has a small grocery store in her house where she sells items that people use on a daily basis. She has fought to succeed.

For many years she has been in this business. Despite the adversities in life, she has been able to succeed. Recently her life has changed. She has two sons in the United States, who send her remittances which help her to cover some of her needs.

She will use the loan to purchase groceries, basic grains, dairy products, sausages, beef, pork and chicken.

Her short-term goal is to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, basic grains, dairy products, sausages, beef, pork and chicken.

loans.name: Betania Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Betania Auxiliadora es una emprendedora con éxito, ya que inicio su propio negocio con fuente propio , y ha luchado por salir adelante. Betania en su  negocio, ella ya tiene sus clientes fijos y eventuales que la visita. Su mayor sueño de Betania era tener su propio negocio y salir adelante, lo cual ha logrado y espera ampliarse en un futuro. Betania está solicitando crédito para poder abastecerse y poder satisfacer a sus clientes con la compra de granos básicos, arroz aceite, frijoles entre otros productos que más le demandan.
texts.en:
Sra. Betania Auxiliadora is a successful entrepreneur. Since starting a business through her own efforts, she has strived to move forward. Betania has established customers who visit her on a regular basis. Her greatest wish was to succeed in her own business, which she was able to accomplish. In the future she hopes to expand.

Betania is requesting a loan so that she can restock her inventory and satisfy her customers. She plans to buy basic grains, rice, oil, beans, and other products that are in great demand.

loans.use: o buy basic grains, rice, oil, beans, and other products.

loans.name: Ana Karina

texts.es:
La Señora. Ana es socia del banco comunal Mi Bankito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por la belleza de su centro histórico el cual cuenta el pasado de esta bella ciudad, esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de la Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente es amable y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Ana tiene 21 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido una niña de 3 años de edad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Ella labora como auxiliar contable, actividad que la desempeña solo medio día de lunes a viernes y el resto de su tiempo cuida de su hijo. En fechas de temporada se dedica a la venta de peluches esta actividad la realiza hace 2 años.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de peluches.
 
Su meta es tener un local para vender los peluches y aumentar su mercadería.
texts.en:
Sra. Ana is a member of the Communal Bank “Mi Bankito” (My Little Bank). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for the beauty of its historical center. The city is surrounded by four rivers, thus giving it the nickname “Santa Ana of the Four Rivers”. The people are friendly and have maintained the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Sra. Ana is 21 years old, married, and has a three-year-old daughter. Her husband works as a private employee. They do not own a home, so they live in a rental property.

Ana is an assistant bookkeeper, but she only works half a day Monday through Friday. She spends the rest of the time caring for her child. On special occasions based on the season, she sells plush toys and has been doing this for two years. Ana is receiving her second loan and will invest in the purchase of plush toys.

Her goal is to have a shop where she can sell plush toys and increase her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy plush toys to sell.

loans.name: Confianza Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento Confianza trabaja con la institución  hace ya ocho ciclos,   las señoras son vecinas de la zona Kupini la presidenta es la señora María  trabaja con la confección de polleras y mantas  para las señoras de polleras y entrega en las tiendas y en los puestos de ventas de los distintos mercados de la ciudad de La Paz, ella entrega según pedido y también vende al por menor, ella es casada tiene dos hijas que se encuentran estudiando, el  esposo trabaja como empleado asalariado en una institución privada, La Sra. María necesita el  crédito para la compra de tela e hilos para la confección de polleras y mantas, La Sra. María es una persona muy trabajadora, su deseo es el de ver  a sus hijos profesionales y también poder crecer en su negocio expandiendo sus productos a las ciudades de Oruro y Cochabamba.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Confianza” (Trust) has already worked with Emprender for eight loan cycles. The women are neighbors from the District of Kupini. The president is Sra. María, who produces skirts and shawls for women and then delivers these products to stores and vending stands in different markets in the city of La Paz. She delivers her goods based on her orders and also sells them at retail. María is married and has two daughters who are studying. Her husband is a salaried employee who works at a private institution.

Sra. María needs a loan in order to buy fabrics and thread for making skirts and shawls. She is a hardworking individual who wants to see her children become professionals. María also wants to grow in her business and expand her product market in the cities of Oruro and Cochabamba.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
La Señora. Lucia es socia del banco comunal Mi Bankito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por la belleza de su centro histórico el cual cuenta el pasado de esta bella ciudad, es bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de la Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente es amable y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Lucia tiene 53 años, es madre soltera  un hijo quien es mayor de edad, soltero trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. Lucia se dedica al negocio de ganado, esta actividad la realiza hace varios años,  también cría otros animales como son cerdos, pollos y cuyes.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes, pollos y cerdos para así crecer más en esta actividad. 
 
Su meta es tener un criadero más grande de animales.
texts.en:
Sra. Lucia is a member of the Communal Bank “Mi Bankito” (My Little Bank). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for the beauty of its historical center. The city is surrounded by four rivers, thus giving it the nickname “Santa Ana of the Four Rivers”. The people are friendly and have maintained the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Doña Lucia is 53 years old and a single mother with a grown son. He works alone and helps out financially. Lucia owns the home in which she lives.

She has a business selling cattle, which she has done for many years. Lucia also raises other animals such as pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs. She is receiving her third loan from the Communal Bank and will invest in the purchase of guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs so that she can grow this part of her business even more.

Her goal is to have a large farm full of animals.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs.

loans.name: Yeny Marcela

texts.es: La joven Yeny a sus 23 años de edad ya es madre de cuatro hijos de 7, 5, 4 y 1 año de edad, toda su vida la ha vivido en el campo del municipio del Carmen de Viboral localizado al oriente de Antioquia, con la necesidad de brindar todo lo necesario a sus hijos y esposo, la joven Yeny adecuo en su pequeña finca un espacio para la cría y venta de cerdos. Actualmente, necesita de la compra de cuido y cerdos para poder seguir luchando y generando los ingresos suficientes para suplir las necesidades básicas de su familia. El sueño de la señora Yeny es ampliar su negocio y ver crecer junto con su esposo a sus cuatro hijos.
texts.en:
Yeny is a young woman who is 23 years of age and the mother of four children (ages 7, 5, 4, and 1). She has lived her entire life on a farm in the town of Carmen de Viboral, which is located east of Antioquia. In order to provide everything that her husband and children need, Yeny set up a small space on her farm for raising and selling pigs.

At the moment, she needs to buy pigs and the supplies for their care so that she can continue striving forward and generating sufficient income to meet the basic needs of her family. Sra. Yeny’s dream is to expand her business and grow with her husband and their four children.

loans.use: to buy pigs and the supplies for their care.

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es:
La señora Maria Julia tiene 46 años de edad, vive en la aldea el Zope, ahi vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo, Maria se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de abarroteria, refrescos, embutidos y otros productos, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion.
doña Maria es una mujer seria y muy reponsable con sus obligaciones, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir su pulperia, desea comprar al  por mayor porque en esta epoca de navidad se vende bastante y quiere tener buenas utilidades.
Su sueño es que en este nuevo año Dios pueda bendecir a todas las familias del mundo.
texts.en: Mrs. María Julia is 46 years old and lives in the village of Zope.  She lives there with her three children and her husband.  Maria has worked for several years selling grocery items, soft drinks, sausages, and other products.  Her business is located in a room of her house.  Maria is a serious and very responsible woman with her obligations.  She will use the loan to purchase goods to stock her grocery store.  She hopes to buy in bulk because in this Christmas season she sells a lot and she wants to have good inventory.  Her dream is that this new year God will bless all the families of the world.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, beans, bread, soft drinks, eggs, sausages, milk, cereal, oatmeal, toilet paper, candles, matches and churros.

loans.name: Shirley Marisol

texts.es:
La Señora Shirley es socia del banco comunal Mi Bankito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por la belleza de su centro histórico el cual cuenta el pasado de esta bella ciudad, es bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de la Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, su gente es amable y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Shirley tiene 23 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 3 hijos de 5, 3 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en un taller de carpintería que es de su propiedad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Ella se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y cuidado de sus hijos, se encuentra en su sexto crédito  que realiza en la banca comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de herramientas para la carpintería de su esposo.

Su meta es terminar sus estudios colegiales.
texts.en:
Sra. Shirley is a member of the Communal Bank “Mi Bankito” (My Little Bank). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for the beauty of its historical center. The city is surrounded by four rivers, thus giving it the nickname “Santa Ana of the Four Rivers”. The people are friendly and have maintained the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Doña Shirley is 23 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children (ages 5, 3, and 2). Her oldest child attends a school in the city. Shirley’s husband works in a carpentry workshop that he owns. They do not own a home, so they live in a rental property.

Shirley takes care of the household chores and looks after her children. She is receiving her sixth loan from the Communal Bank and will invest in the purchase of tools for her husband’s carpentry business. Her goal is to finish her college studies.

loans.use: to buy tools for her husband's carpentry business.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: La Sra. Matilde es cliente antigua, ella se dedica a la venta de desayunos, jugos, ensaladas de fruta. Refrescos hervidos, que ella prepara, en su puesto de venta, los clientes en su mayoría son los trabajadores en construcción, quienes consumen diariamente sus productos, la señora Matilde es casada y  tiene una hija en edad escolar, toda la familia vive por la zona sur, él esposo de la Sra.  Se dedica al servicio de transporte en radio taxi, La Sra. Matilde  invertirá el crédito en la compra de equipo de cocina, ollas, tazas, vasos etc. Y parte para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de los desayunos como azúcar, café, te, y fiambres,  la señora es cliente responsable ya que siempre pago puntual sus cuotas de sus anteriores créditos, ella se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo ya que creció en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Matilda is a longtime client. She sells breakfast, juices, fruit salads, soft drinks, and fish stews that she prepares from her vending stall. Her customers are mostly construction workers who buy her products on a daily basis. Sra. Matilda is married and has a daughter who is of school age. She and her entire family live in the southern district. Her husband is a radio taxi driver.

Sra. Matilda will invest her loan in the purchase of cooking equipment, pots, cups, glasses, and other supplies. This will include ingredients for preparing breakfast such as sugar, coffee, tea, and cold cuts. Matilda is a responsible client who is always punctual with her payments, as demonstrated in her previous loans. She is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided so that she can grow in her business.

loans.use: to buy cooking equipment, pots, cups, glasses, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Doña Dolores, de 56 años de edad, vive en una colonia rural de Choloma, Cortes. Hace 30 años que vive con su esposo, el se dedica a la albañilería, tienen un hijo de 25 años de edad. 
Ella es una señora comerciante desde hace 10 años, quien se dedica a vender ropa de niño, blusas, pantalones, trajes y ropa de cama o sabanas. También genera otros ingresos vendiendo donas. Le ha motivado trabajar en lo propio y crecer como comerciante. Con ODEF a obtenido 10 prestamos con los cuales a hecho incrementar su inventario. Con el préstamo actual va comprar blusas, trajes de niñas, pantalones y ropa de cama o sabanas para vender en esta temporada.
Su propósito es mantener el negocio y seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Dolores, age 56, lives in the rural community of Choloma, Cortes.  She has lived with her husband, a bricklayer, for 30 years.  They have a 25 year old son.

She has been a merchant for ten years.  She sells children’s clothes, blouses, pants, suits, and bedding or sheets.  She also generates other income by selling doughnuts.  She was motivated to work on her own and to grow as a merchant.

She has received ten loans from ODEF, which increased her inventory.  She will use the current loan to buy blouses, children’s clothes, pants, and bedding or sheets to sell this season.

Her intention is to maintain her business and to continue growing.

loans.use: to stock her business with adult and children's clothing (blouses, pants, suits, and sheets).

location.town: Los Altos de santa Fe, Choloma

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es: La señora María vive en la zona de Villa armonía, es viuda y tiene un hijo con el que vive en la casa de los padres de ella. María se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza los cuales reparte a crédito a varios clientes de la zona y otros lugares de la zona central. Su hijo tiene un equipo de amplificación que alquila para todo tipo de acontecimientos sociales. Es la primera vez que María trabaja con préstamos de emprender y espera utilizar el dinero para la compra de más productos de belleza y así incrementar su capital y sus ingresos. De manera paralela a la venta de los productos de belleza, María también se dedica a la costura junto a su hermana pero esta actividad solo es por temporada. Ella anhela poder algún día comprar una casita e incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Sra. María lives in the District of Villa Armonía. She is a widow and lives with her son at her parents’ house. María sells cosmetics and beauty products on credit to her various customers in the area and in other places within the central district. Her son owns sound equipment that he rents out for all types of social events.

This is the first time that María has worked with loans from Emprender and she hopes to utilize the money by purchasing more beauty products so that she can increase her capital and her income. In addition to selling beauty products, María works as a seamstress alongside her sister. However, she engages in this work only a seasonal basis. Her wish someday is to buy a small house and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Gabriel; el tiene 32 años de edad y es soltero; El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania como pinturas y cuadros y tambien sigue trabajando en una empresa publica,el socio el negocio de artesania lo vende en forma independiente desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño del socio es tener una tienda donde pueda vender la artesania . El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía como cuadros y pinturas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Gabriel is 32 years old, single, and continues to work in his business where he sells handicrafts such as pictures and paintings. He also continues working at his job with a public company. In his handicraft business, Gabriel sells independently between the hours of 8am and 6pm. His dream is to have a shop where he can sell handicrafts. He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, such as pictures and paintings.

Gabriel is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to purchase pictures and paintings to sell.

loans.name: Adeluz

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Adeluz; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia sigue trbajando en su negocio de servicio de llamadas telefonicas,ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere salir adelante y poder ahorra para que pueda estudiar alguna carrera profesional,el sueño de l socia es poder tener un local donde pueda poner el servicio de llamadas . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar celulares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Adeluz is 23 years old, single, and continues to work in her business of providing telephone calling services. She works as a traveling vendor from 7am to 9pm. Through her work, she is able to move forward and save toward being able to study for a professional degree. Her dream is to have a location where she can provide calling services. She is requesting a loan to buy mobile phones.

Adeluz is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phones.

loans.name: Rene

texts.en:
René has more than two decades of experience in running his own business. In the past, he owned a restaurant, worked for insurance agencies, was a real estate agent, and within the last three years, took a break as a real estate agent to better understand the marketing industry. René began his business, Manfre & Associates Consulting Services, this year in hopes to get contracted through other insurance companies and brand his name. He said his business goal is to "help people help people " by being a company that understands where most businesses are in their process, their challenges and help them achieve their goals. At his business, René mainly deals with health, life and other insurance questions to place others in a better situation if possible. He also teaches other entrepreneurs how to use marketing and the Internet to stay in contact with their current clients and contact future clients. 

Currently, he has ten other consulting associates, under them, he employees about 30 people. The different associates have a vast history and knowledge ranging between home finance and investment properties. He added, they know what it takes to operate a business, cut costs and save funds. He is using the loan money to pay for small marketing, part-time staff development, and next year's business planning while between commission checks. He plans to help place the workers on salary to help his business grow. René is looking to hire at least five people, by 2013, he hopes to have 20-30 employees, and within the next three years, he plans to have 100 employees. 

René said obtaining this loan "is a great opportunity to get started. I think it's going to help me out a great deal. It'll give me the opportunity to grow." Without it, he would have had a slightly more complicated time putting together ideas that will help his business grow. "It gives me a little bit of a leap without stressing," he added. His background in different personal experiences along with his associates' gives the company an avenue to help.

loans.use: To pay for marketing and part-time staff development.

loans.name: Yesenia Sorayda

texts.es:
Yesenia tiene 25 años edad y es tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella nació en la ciudad de Cusco pero actualmente vive en la ciudad Gamitana, ella se dedica  a la compra y venta de madera y también se dedica a la agricultura. Ya son 20 años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.

Yesenia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para invertir en las chacras por lo tanto va comprar semillas y abonos. 

Yesenia es integrante del grupo “Nuevo Amanecer de Gamitana” lo conforman 16 socios que viven en el Comunidad de Gamitana en la selva del Perú.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 25, and in a common-law relationship. She has one child. She was born in the city of Cusco, but currently lives in the community of Gamitana. She buys and sells wood, and also farms. 

She has been in business for 20 years now, and it's going very well, thanks to the determination she puts into her work. On this occasion, Yesenia needs the loan to invest in her small farm, so she is going to buy seeds and fertilizers. 

Yesenia is a member of the "Nuevo Amanecer de Gamitana" communal bank, made up of 16 members who live in the community of Gamitana in Peru's tropical forest.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer to use on her small farm.

location.town: Gamitana - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La Sra. Edith, es soltera y tiene 38 años de edad,  tiene una hija de 12 años de edad, ella sigue siendo secretaria en una institucion privada y sigue teneiendo un negocio de cafetin,ella atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de cafetin . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar sillas,mesas y productos para cocinar como carne,pollo y verduras.
 
La socia valora y agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Edith, is 38, and single.  She has a 12 year-old daughter. She continues to work as a secretary in a private institute, and continues to have a small café. 

She is open from 8:00am to 6:00pm. Her dream is to expand and improve her business. She is applying for the loan to buy chairs, tables, and cooking ingredients, such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

The borrower values and appreciates the loan she has been granted, and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy chairs, tables, and cooking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Valentina; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de llamadas telefonicas,ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda realizar las llamadas telefonicas . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar celulares y pagar las lineas de telefono.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower is Valentina. She is 38, married, and has three children. She has a business providing telephone call services. She works from 8:00am to 7:00pm as a street vendor. 

By means of this business she is raising her children. Her dream is to have her own shop where she can do telephone calls. She is applying for the loan to buy cell phones and pay for telephone lines.

The borrower is happy about the loan and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy cell phones and pay for telephone lines.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Juana; Continua con su negocio de venta de pescado y pollo en el mercado de Urcos, la socia tiene sus proveedores de los cuales compra pescado y pollo para la venta, la socia solicita el credito para invertir en la compra de pollos y de pescado y en estas fiesta como es de costumbre la socia compra pavos para venderlos en visperas de año nuevo.
texts.en:
Juana continues with her business of selling fish and chicken at the Urcos market.  She has her suppliers from whom she buys fish and chicken to sell.

Juana is requesting the loan to buy chicken and fish.  During these festivities she buys the customary turkeys to sell for New Year’s Eve.

loans.use: to buy chicken and fish, and to buy turkeys to sell for New Year's Eve.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Leonada; La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de pollos, la socia sigue vendiendo en la plaza de Urcos en su carreta, la socia tambien tiene una cantina en la que vende cervezas, chicha, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de cervezas para incrementar sus ventas en estas fiestas navideñas.
texts.en:
Leonada continues with her business of buying and selling chickens.  She continues to sell from her cart at the Urcos plaza.  She also has a cantina where she sells beer and “chicha” (a traditional, corn-based drink).

This time she wishes to use the loan to buy beer to increase her sales during the Christmas festivities.

loans.use: to buy beer to increase her sales during the Christmas festivities.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel tiene 61 años edad y es tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Urcos pero actualmente vive en la ciudad Gamitana, ella se dedica a la agricultura y cultiva diferentes productos como yuca, maíz, arroz y otras cosas, ella tambien se dedica  a la compra y venta de madera.  Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.

Isabel en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para invertir en las chacras por lo tanto va comprar semillas y abonos. 

Isabel es integrante del grupo “Nuevo Amanecer de Gamitana” lo conforman 16 socios que viven en el Comunidad de Gamitana en la selva del Perú.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 61, is in a common-law-marriage and has five children.  She was born in the city of Urcos, but she currently lives in the city of Gamitana.

She devotes herself to agriculture and growing different products like yucca, corn, rice, and others.  She also buys and sells wood.  She has been in the business for several years.  It is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

At this time Isabel needs a loan to invest in her farm.  She will buy seeds and fertilizers.

Isabel is a member of the “Nuevo Amanecer de Gamitana” (Gamitana’s New Dawn) communal bank.  It is comprised of 16 members who live in the Gamitana community in the Peruvian jungle.

loans.use: to invest in her farm by purchasing seeds and fertilizers.

location.town: Gamitana - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 44 years old and married. She has one child.

Shirley works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business of buying and selling spices in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional spices to sell.

Shirley has borrowed and repaid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell spices business for 5 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane and operating her sari-sari store.

Shirley aspires to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional spices to sell.

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера замужем, у двое взрослых детей. Она владеет небольшим магазином, где продает продукты питания. Вера занимается этим видом бизнеса уже 20 лет. Она предприимчива и трудолюбива, постоянно развивает свой бизнес. 
Вера просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 10,000 гривен на закупку продуктов к праздникам. Она хочет увеличить ассортимент и таким образом увеличить оборот. Получив дополнительную прибыль, Вера планирует закончить ремонт в своей квартире.
texts.en: Vera is married and has two adult children. She owns a small store where she sells groceries. Vera has been managing her store for more then 20 years. She is enterprising and hardworking, and always thinks of ways to improve her business. Currently Vera is requesting a loan of 10,000 griven to purchase additional goods for the holidays. She wants to expand her inventory and be able to offer the customers more choices which will result in additional profits. Vera is planning to use the profits to finish improving her apartment.

loans.use: to expand inventory for the holidays

loans.name: María Guadalupe

texts.es: María Guadalupe de 57 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo, nieta y suegra de 57, 15 y 85 años respectivamente. Se dedica a la venta de diferentes productos tales como: ropa, cosméticos, controles,  lámparas, etc. Esta actividad la realiza de forma  ambulante junto con la ayuda de su esposo. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y gracias a su arduo trabajo ha sabido mantenerlo activo. Muchas personas la prefieren por ser una mujer trabajadora, honesta y amable. Todos los días sale desde tempranas horas para mostrar los diferentes productos a sus clientes que cada día son más. Últimamente ha estado pensando en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio ya que la situación económica cada día es más difícil y no encuentra otra forma de hacer dinero para dar a su familia lo necesario. Esto la ha llevado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL   para comprar variedad de artículos tales como: prendas de vestir, cosméticos, y de más productos que sean atractivos  para los clientes ya que su meta es mejorar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos de tal forma que pueda tener la oportunidad de accesar a una mejor oportunidad de vida. No pierde las esperanzas que de esta manera su situación va a mejorar.
texts.en:
María Guadalupe is 57, and lives in her own house with her family, consisting of her husband, granddaughter, and mother-in-law, ages 57, 15, and 85 respectively. 

She sells various products, such as clothing, cosmetics, remote controls, lamps etc.. She works as a street vendor, with her husband's help.

She has been working in this business for many years, and thanks to her hard work, she has been able to keep herself busy. Many people prefer her because she is a hard-working, honest, and friendly woman. She goes out every day from an early hour to display her various products to her customers, who are more numerous every day. 

Lately she has been thinking about a way of increasing her business, as the economic situation is more difficult every day, and she isn't finding another way to make money to provide her family with the necessities. 

This has led her to apply to Integral for this loan, in order to buy a variety of goods, such as articles of clothing, cosmetics, and other products that may be attractive to her customers. Her goal is to improve her sales and income, so that she can have the chance to access better opportunities in life. 

She doesn't lose hope that in this way, her situation is going to improve.

loans.use: To buy articles of clothing, cosmetics, remote controls, and lamps.

loans.name: Marina Edilberta

texts.es: Marina Edilberta  de 56 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo de 66 años, hija de 23 años y su nieto de 6 años. Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de ricas tortillas las cuales las prepara en su hogar de residencia con mucho amor y dedicación. Marina Edilberta es una mujer increíble con muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha.  Ella es de las mujeres que no les gusta quedarse en casa esperando que el esposo contribuya con toda la economía del hogar. Se levanta  desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana para preparar todos los ingredientes para la elaboración de las ricas tortillas. Gracias a la experiencia y buena disposición para servir que ella posee ha logrado ganarse la confianza de algunos clientes, su sueño es dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida ya que para ella es lo más importante y es por ella que se impulsa día con día para trabajar con muchas energías y dedicación. Esto la ha llevado a pensar en la posibilidad de buscas ayuda para invertir en su negocio. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los insumos necesarios (maíz, agua, gas propano, etc.) que le permitan aumentar las ventas e ingresos de tal forma que con su trabajo y con la ayuda de Dios pueda lograr el sueño de dar a su familia una calidad de vida diferente.
texts.en:
Marina Edilberta is 56, and lives in her own home with her family, consisting of her husband, 66, her daughter, 23, and her 6 year-old grandson. She makes and sells delicious tortillas, that she prepares with much love and dedication, in her own home.

Marina Edilberta is an incredible woman with many business ideas, which she is implementing little by little. She is one of those women who don't like to stay at home, waiting for their husband to pay for all the household expenses.

She gets up very early in the morning to prepare all the ingredients for making her delicious tortillas. Thanks to her experience and helpfulness, she has managed to gain the trust of a number of customers. 

Her dream is to give her family a better quality of life, as that's the most important thing for her. That's why she is motivated every day to work with a lot of energy and dedication. 

This has led her to think about the possibility of seeking help to invest in her business. She has made the decision to apply to Integral for this loan, in order to buy the necessary supplies (corn, water, propane gas) that allow her to increase her sales and income. In this way, with her work and God's help, she can achieve her dream of giving her family a different quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn, water, and propane gas.

loans.name: Julia Haydee

texts.es: Julia Haydee de 40 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con sus 4 hijos dos de los cuales trabajan y el resto estudia. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de carteras y bolsos para todos los gustos y preferencias, los cuales promociona de manera ambulante en diferentes zonas cerca de su lugar de residencia.  Julia Haydee se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy creativa, dedicada y sobre todo responsable. Muchas personas confían en ella ya que siempre ofrece calidad y buenos precios  en los productos que vende. Cuenta con mucha experiencia en esta actividad ya que son muchos años los que ha trabajado en la misma. Su sueño es poder abarcar una mayor demanda  del mercado ya que muchas veces no alcanza a cubrirla por la limitación en materia prima para realizar los diferentes bolsos y carteras. Debido a esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios (cuero, hilo, agujas, telas, etc.) con el fin de cumplir su sueño y poder ofrecer mejores condiciones a su familia ya que todo lo que hace es por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Julia Haydee is 40 years old and lives in her own house with 4 children, 2 of whom work and the rest study. She makes hand-held wallets and purses for all tastes and preferences, which she sells door to door in different zones near her place of residence.

Julia Haydee is a very creative, dedicated and above all responsible person. Many people have confidence in her, because she always offers quality and good prices for the products she sells. Julia can count on lots of experience in this activity, since she has worked at this for many years.

Julia Haydee's dream is to be able to embrace a greater market demand, since often, she can't cover demand due to the lack of primary materials for making her different purses and wallets. That's why she has decided to request this loan through INTEGRAL, to invest in buying the necessary supplies for her business (leather, thread, needles, cloth, etc.) in order to fulfill her dream and be able to offer better conditions for her family. Everything she does is aimed at improving their conditions of life.

loans.use: buy leather, thread, needles, cloth, etc., to make wallets and purses.

loans.name: María Argelia

texts.es: María Argelia  de 63 años de edad, habita en su propia casa junto con su grupo familiar el cual está formado por sus tres nietos y su esposo el cual se dedica a la agricultura. La señora María se caracteriza por ser amable, dedicada pero sobre todo trabajadora. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de deliciosas tortillas. Cada mañana se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana para preparar todos los ingredientes de las tortillas a fin de tenerlas a tiempo cuando los clientes las soliciten. A  pesar de su avanzada edad no se da por vencida, para ella es muy importante mantener su negocio ya que de esta manera colabora con la economía del hogar que muchas veces no alcanza a cubrir todas las necesidades. Ella es muy emprendedora siempre está pensando en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio. Últimamente ha pensado mucho en la posibilidad de hacer un préstamo para invertir en la tortillería a fin de de tener una mayor oferta para sus clientes de tal forma que esto le permita atraer a más clientes. Todo esto la llevo a tomar la decisión de de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos (maíz, agua, cal, gas propano, etc.) necesarios para seguir produciendo y ofreciendo las deliciosa tortillas. Todo esto lo hace con el objetivo de mejorar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos de tal forma que su calidad de vida y la de su familia mejoren.
texts.en: Maria Argelia, who is 63 years old, lives in her own house with her family group, which is formed by her three grandchildren and her husband, who works in agriculture. Señora Maria is characterized by being kind, dedicated, and, above all, hard-working. Her work is making and selling delicious tortillas. Every morning she gets up in the early hours of the morning to prepare all the ingredients for the tortillas, so that she will have them ready when the customers ask for them. In spite of her advanced age, she does not give up. For her, it is very important to maintain her business, since in this way she contributes to the household finances, which often are not sufficient to cover all the necessities. She is very enterprising. She is always thinking of ways to make her business grow. Finally, she thought a lot about the possibility of getting a loan to invest in her tortilla shop, with the goal of having a better supply for her customers so that it would allow her to attract more customers. All this brought her to take the decision to apply for a loan at INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of the ingredients (corn, water, lime, propane gas, etc) necessary to continue producing and offering the delicious tortillas. She does all this with the goal of improving her levels of sales and income in such a way that her quality of life and that of her family will improve.

loans.use: to buy corn, water, lime, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Ena Gladys

texts.es: Ena Gladys  de 56 años de edad, habita con su esposo  de 60 años y su hijo de 37 años en casa propia. La señora Ena   es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia. El negocio consiste en un salón de belleza  que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Ena lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre ofrece el mejor servicio a sus clientes. Ella  sueña con dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y sabe que la única forma de hacerlo es trabajando duramente en su negocio y esforzándose por hacer las cosas bien. El salón de belleza es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que ha decidido invertir en el,  de tal forma que pueda seguir dando los frutos que hasta el momento ha dado. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL para poder invertir en su negocio en la compra de: cosméticos, cremas, champú, desodorantes, tintes, tijeras y otros productos necesarios para mantener en marcha el negocio. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Ena Gladys, who is 56 years old, lives with her husband, who is 60, and their son, who is 37, in their own house. Señora Ena is an enterprising and hardworking woman. A few years ago she decided to set up a little business in her home. The business consists of a beauty salon, which, with great effort and dedication, she has managed to maintain throughout several years. She has many customers, since for Ena the most important thing is her customers. She always tends to them with a smile and great kindness, and this is the reason she has won the confidence of many people in her neighborhood, and in addition she always offers the best service to her customers. She dreams of giving her family a better quality of life and knows that the only way to do it is to work hard at her business and make the effort to do things well. The beauty salon is her principal source of income, so she has decided to invest in it in such a way that it can continue giving the income that it has given up to now. It is for this reason that she was motivated to apply for this loan at INTEGRAL so that she will be able to invest in her business by buying cosmetics, creams, shampoo, deodorants, dyes, scissors, and other products necessary to keep the business going. She trusts that in this way she will fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, creams, shampoo, deodorants, dyes, and scissors.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa de cincuenta años de edad, reside en casa propia junto  con su hijo y nuera. Su esposo murió hace algunos años. Elsa ha hecho de su casa un negocio. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricas pupusas que día a día ofrece a sus clientes con mucho entusiasmo. Elsa es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y dedicada en su negocio. Muchas personas la conocen y dan referencia de ella y da las deliciosas pupusas que ofrece. Para Elsa lo más importante son los clientes, por lo que se preocupa en atenderlos de la mejor manera posible esto ha hacho que muchas personas la prefieran ya que siempre tiene una sonrisa y mucho entusiasmo para atender su negocio. Desea ampliar la capacidad de su negocio de tal manera que pueda cubrir una mayor demanda. Para esto necesita invertir en mayor cantidad de insumos que le permitan lograr su objetivo. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar a INTEGRAL este crédito para comprar los insumos necesarios como: maíz, arroz, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Elsa, age 50, lives in her own home with her son and daughter-in-law. Her husband passed away a few years ago. Elsa has made her home into a business. She makes and sells rich pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans], which she offers her clients every day with great enthusiasm. She is an enterprising, hard-working woman who is dedicated to her business. She is well-known and customers often refer others to her because of her delicious pupusas. Elisa's customers are the most important part of her business, so she works hard to give them the best possible service. Because of this, many people prefer her business; she's always got a smile and a great enthusiasm for her business. She wants to expand her business so that she can serve more customers. In order to achieve this goal, she needs to invest in more supplies. For this reason, she has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy the necessary supplies such as: corn, rice, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc. Her goal is to increase her sales and her income in order to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy: corn, rice, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Denny Adenir

texts.es: Denny Adenir de 35 años de edad, habita en casa familiar con su  compañera de vida  y sus tres hijos. Denny es un hombre trabajador el cual no se cansa de luchar día con día por el bienestar de su familia. Su principal inspiración es su familia la cual lo motiva a trabajar duramente para darles una calidad de vida diferente a la que él ha tenido. Él se dedica totalmente a su negocio que ha establecido desde hace barios años. Su negocio es una peluquería en la cual se pueden hacer diversidad de cortes de cabello en especial para los caballeros.
